issue.title: [C++] Enable Arrow production builds on Linux / macOS without Boost dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1552](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1552). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, we use Boost on a very limited basis. We should consider making Boost a non-dependency on POSIX-based systems (i.e. we can continue to use boost::filesystem on Windows), and still use Boost where useful in the test suite.
